/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
